channel.title: Karakalpak Voice
channel.description: Official media platform of the Republic of Karakalpakstan. News, history, and sovereignty.

item.title: Declaration of State Sovereignty of Karakalpakstan
item.description: The historic declaration adopted on December 14, 1990, establishing the sovereignty of the Republic of Karakalpakstan.

item.title: Constitution of the Republic of Karakalpakstan
item.description: The supreme law of Karakalpakstan, defining the rights and freedoms of its citizens.

item.title: State Flag of Karakalpakstan
item.description: Symbolism and history of the National Flag of the Republic of Karakalpakstan.
